attributes.action: add Welly Wanging to the 2012 Olympic sports list.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
'Welly Wanging'- The sport where competitors attempt to throw a wellington boot as far as possible, from a running or standing start.

A standing tradition through many scout units across the country, welly wanging is a sport which many people love to watch a play.

I, among others feel that for this reason, welly wanging deserves a place in the 2012 Olympics.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
